alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 10:03AM EST until January 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Georgia, Coastal Chatham County. In South Carolina, Beaufort, Coastal Colleton, Charleston, Coastal Jasper and Tidal Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even stronger winds could occur on elevated bridges such as the the Ravenel Bridge, the Don Holt Bridge, the James B. Edwards Bridge, the Ben Sawyer Bridge, the Isle of Palms Connector, the Amos Nathaniel Rodgers Bridge, the McKinley Washington Junior Bridge and the Woods Memorial Bridge. Dangerous driving conditions are likely on these bridges. Heed any potential bridge closures or warnings from local officials.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Tidal Berkeley
